# Data

Describe data

```{r groups, echo=FALSE}
ff <- list.files(datadir, pattern="metadata.csv$", full=TRUE)
groups <- gsub("_metadata.csv$", "", basename(ff))
groups <- gsub("^carob-", "", groups)
d <- lapply(ff, read.csv)
n <- sapply(d, nrow)
x <- data.frame(Group=groups, datasets=n)
knitr::kable(x, caption="Datasets by group")
#kableExtra::kbl(x) |> kable_classic(full_width = FALSE) |> kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", #"hover"))


```
